_notes.game_name: Name of the game to simulate (must match the folder class in SlotLab.Engine.Games).
_notes.rebuild_engine: If true, run 'dotnet build' before simulation to refresh the DLL.
_notes.config_mode: 'stable' = use engine json game config, 'test' = use simulator excel tables as config.
_notes.overwrite_stable_after_test: If true, after the simulation the stable version will be overwritted by the config used
